statements: SELECT user_id, statement_date, total_balance, last_payment_date FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT statement_date, total_balance FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE total_balance > 1000
SELECT * FROM MonthlyStatements ORDER BY statement_date ASC
SELECT user_id, statement_date FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE last_payment_date IS NULL
SELECT total_balance FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE statement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' LIMIT 3
SELECT user_id, statement_date, total_balance FROM MonthlyStatements ORDER BY total_balance DESC, statement_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, statement_date, total_balance, last_payment_date FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE total_balance > 1000 ORDER BY statement_date DESC
SELECT user_id, statement_date, total_balance FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE statement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT statement_date, SUM(total_balance) AS total_balance_sum FROM MonthlyStatements GROUP BY statement_date ORDER BY statement_date ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(statement_date) AS statement_count FROM MonthlyStatements GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(statement_date) > 5
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements;
SELECT statement_date, total_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, total_amount FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT statement_id FROM monthly_statements WHERE statement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT account_balance, last_login FROM account_summary WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY statement_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT statement_id, user_id, total_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM account_summary WHERE account_balance > 5000 AND last_login > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_login ASC;
SELECT statement_date, SUM(total_amount) AS total_expenses FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY statement_date ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT ms.user_id, as.account_balance, ms.total_amount FROM monthly_statements ms JOIN account_summary as ON ms.user_id = as.user_id WHERE ms.total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY as.account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts;
SELECT user_id, month_year, total_amount FROM statements;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.user_id = accounts.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT statement_id, total_amount FROM statements ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.balance FROM users u JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_statements FROM statements GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM Accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT user_id, statement_date, total_balance FROM Statements ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id > 2 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, account_type, balance FROM Accounts JOIN Users ON Accounts.user_id = Users.user_id ORDER BY user_id ASC, balance DESC;

SELECT username, transaction_date, amount FROM Users JOIN Accounts ON Users.user_id = Accounts.user_id JOIN Transactions ON Accounts.account_id = Transactions.account_id WHERE Users.user_id = 3 AND amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT username, statement_date, total_balance FROM Users JOIN Statements ON Users.user_id = Statements.user_id WHERE total_balance < 5000 ORDER BY statement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MonthlyStatements ORDER BY statement_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT summary_id, user_id, account_balance FROM AccountSummary WHERE account_balance > 1000
SELECT transaction_date, amount, description FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, theme, notification_enabled FROM UserSettings
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Users ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Users WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, total_amount FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_balance, last_payment_date FROM AccountSummary WHERE account_balance < 0 ORDER BY last_payment_date ASC;
